item.title: 常用的前端框架
item.description: 前端框架 MVVM, MVC 什么的还不清楚… angular vue react ant-design jQuery extjs zepto jQuery jQueryUI : javascript 框架和前端框架不是一个东西? ##转 infoQ Backbone.js: Provides models with key-value binding and custom events, collections, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface. AngularJS: A toolset based on extending the HTML vocabulary for your application. Ember.js: Provides template written in the Handlebars templating language, views, controllers, models and a router.
